an3.17:1.1: “Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamma attabyabadhayapi samvattanti, parabyabadhayapi samvattanti, ubhayabyabadhayapi samvattanti.
an3.17:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamma attabyabadhayapi samvattanti, parabyabadhayapi samvattanti, ubhayabyabadhayapi samvattanti.
an3.17:2.1: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamma nevattabyabadhayapi samvattanti, na parabyabadhayapi samvattanti, na ubhayabyabadhayapi samvattanti.
an3.17:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamma nevattabyabadhayapi samvattanti, na parabyabadhayapi samvattanti, na ubhayabyabadhayapi samvattanti”ti.
